TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration extends System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 定義 Security Token Service (STS) 的組態。

span.span: Defines the configuration for a security token service (STS).

summary.span: 實作衍生自 類別之 STS 的類別。

span.span: Classes that implement STSs derive from the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 中所使用的程式碼範例主題摘錄自`Custom Token`範例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)，並且包括能夠為 SWT 權杖的被動式 STS 實作。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 如需如何實作主動式 STS 的範例，請參閱`Federation Metadata`範例。For an example of how to implement an active STS, you can see the `Federation Metadata` sample. 如需這些範例以及提供其他範例 WIF 以及有關下載這些檔案的位置資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about these samples and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼顯示的自訂實作類別，以支援被動式 STS 處理 SWT 權杖。The following code shows a custom implementation of the class to support a passive STS that processes SWT tokens. 組態會初始化並儲存在 HTTP 應用程式狀態在第一次靜態`Current`屬性存取。The configuration is initialized and stored in the HTTP application state the first time the static `Current` property is accessed. 建構函式會初始化與自訂 STS、 自訂的簽發者的語彙基元解析程式，以及預設的權杖類型 (SWT 權杖型別 URI) 類型的自訂組態的屬性。The constructor initializes the properties of the custom configuration with the type of the custom STS, a custom issuer token resolver, and the default token type (the URI of the SWT token type). 它也會加入至預設處理常式集合的 SWT 權杖處理常式。It also adds an SWT token handler to the default handler collection. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenserviceconfiguration.cs#2)] 下列程式碼示範如何叫用自訂的被動式 STS，以處理 WS-同盟要求，藉由呼叫方法中的程式碼後置`default.aspx.cs`檔案。The following code shows how to invoke a custom passive STS to process a WS-Federation request by calling the method from the code behind in the `default.aspx.cs` file. 方法初始化的執行個體`PassiveSTS.CustomSecurityTokenService`類別使用的屬性上設定`CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration`先前範例中顯示的類別。The method initializes an instance of the `PassiveSTS.CustomSecurityTokenService` class using the properties set on the `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration` class shown in the previous example. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/default.aspx.cs#1)]

summary.span: 從 屬性中指定的 建立 Security Token Service (STS) 執行個體。

span.span: Creates an security token service (STS) instance from the specified in the property.

returns.span: 屬性中所指定之 的執行個體。

span.span: An instance of the specified in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的類別屬性必須實作接受類型參數的建構函式。The class specified in the property must implement a constructor that takes a parameter of type . ## Examples 中所使用的程式碼範例主題摘錄自`Custom Token`範例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)，並且包括能夠為 SWT 權杖的被動式 STS 實作。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 如需如何實作主動式 STS 的範例，請參閱`Federation Metadata`範例。For an example of how to implement an active STS, you can see the `Federation Metadata` sample. 如需這些範例以及提供其他範例 WIF 以及有關下載這些檔案的位置資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about these samples and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼顯示的自訂實作類別，以支援被動式 STS 處理 SWT 權杖。The following code shows a custom implementation of the class to support a passive STS that processes SWT tokens. 組態會初始化並儲存在 HTTP 應用程式狀態在第一次靜態`Current`屬性存取。The configuration is initialized and stored in the HTTP application state the first time the static `Current` property is accessed. 建構函式會初始化與自訂 STS、 自訂的簽發者的語彙基元解析程式，以及預設的權杖類型 (SWT 權杖型別 URI) 類型的自訂組態的屬性。The constructor initializes the properties of the custom configuration with the type of the custom STS, a custom issuer token resolver, and the default token type (the URI of the SWT token type). 它也會加入至預設處理常式集合的 SWT 權杖處理常式。It also adds an SWT token handler to the default handler collection. 下列程式碼示範如何叫用自訂的被動式 STS，以處理 WS-同盟要求，藉由呼叫方法中的程式碼後置`default.aspx.cs`檔案。The following code shows how to invoke a custom passive STS to process a WS-Federation request by calling the method from the code behind in the `default.aspx.cs` file. 方法初始化的執行個體`PassiveSTS.CustomSecurityTokenService`類別使用的目前設定的屬性`CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration`物件。The method initializes an instance of the `PassiveSTS.CustomSecurityTokenService` class using the properties set on the current `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration` object. `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.Current`實作屬性`CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration`類別，並傳回 HTTP 應用程式狀態會儲存類別的執行個體。The `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.Current` property is implemented by the `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration` class and returns the instance of the class that is saved in the HTTP application state. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/default.aspx.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DefaultMaxSymmetricKeySizeInBits { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定預設金鑰大小限制 (以位元為單位)，用來檢查要求中指定的 KeySize 是否在此限制內。

span.span: Gets or sets the default key size limit in bits used check if the KeySize specified in the request is within this limit.

value.span: 預設金鑰大小限制，以位元為單位。

span.span: The default key size limit, in bits.
The default is 1024.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這只適用於的對稱金鑰的大小寫。This only applies to the symmetric key case.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DefaultSymmetricKeySizeInBits { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於所發出權杖的預設金鑰大小 (以位元為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the default key size in bits used in the issued token.

value.span: 用於核發之權杖的金鑰大小 (以位元為單位)。

span.span: The key size used in the issued token, in bits.
The default is 256.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這只適用於的對稱金鑰的大小寫。This only applies to the symmetric key case.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan DefaultTokenLifetime { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於所發出權杖的預設存留期。

span.span: Gets or sets the default lifetime used in the issued tokens.

value.span: 使用已簽發權杖的預設存留期。

span.span: The default lifetime to use in issued tokens.
The default is 1 day.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultTokenType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在發出權杖時所用的預設權杖型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the default token type that is used in token issuance.

value.span: 傳回字串，包含預設的語彙基元型別。

span.span: Returns a string that contains the default token type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks URI 格式; 所指定的字串值例如，SAML 1.1 權杖類型，以下是字串值： http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/oasis-wss-saml-token-profile-1.1#SAMLV1.1。The string values are specified in URI format; for example, for the SAML 1.1 token type, the following is the string value: http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/oasis-wss-saml-token-profile-1.1#SAMLV1.1. 預設的語彙基元型別設定為 SAML 1.1。The default token type is set to SAML 1.1.

exception.span: 指定的值是 或空白。

span.span: The specified value is or empty.

exception.span: 指定的值未在權杖處理常式中定義。

span.span: The specified value is not defined in the token handlers.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisableWsdl { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定是否應針對安全性權杖服務 (STS) 啟用 WSDL 產生。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether WSDL generation should be enabled for the security token service (STS).

value.span: 表示要為 STS 啟用 WSDL 產生，否則為 。

span.span: to enable WSDL generation for the STS; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan MaximumTokenLifetime { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定所發行權杖的最大權杖存留期。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum token lifetime for issued tokens.

value.span: 所核發權杖的最大權杖存留期。

span.span: The maximum token lifetime for issued tokens.
The default is 1 day.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ SecurityTokenService { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定安全性權杖服務 (STS) 的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the of the security token service (STS).

value.span: 安全性權杖服務的類型。

span.span: The type of the security token service.

value.span: 型別必須衍生自 類別。

span.span: The type must derive from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的類別屬性必須實作接受類型參數的建構函式。The class specified in the property must implement a constructor that takes a parameter of type .

span.span: The specified value is not assignable as .
The specified value is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SigningCredentials ^ SigningCredentials { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SigningCredentials ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SigningCredentials ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定簽署認證。

span.span: Gets or sets the signing credentials.
The signing credentials.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 實作使用中安全性權杖服務 (STS) 時，會忽略 屬性。The property is ignored when implementing an active security token service (STS). 您必須改為在裝載 STS 的服務主機上透過 屬性設定服務憑證。Instead you must set the service certificate through the property on the service host that is hosting your STS. 用於 類別所表示之使用中 STS 的服務主機。The service host used for an active STS is represented by the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TokenIssuerName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定簽發者名稱，以便設定在發出的權杖中。

span.span: Gets or sets the issuer name so that it can be set in the issued token.
The issuer name.

exception.span: 嘗試將屬性設為 或空字串。

span.span: An attempt to set the property to or an empty string occurs.
